name: Ano Hi Mita Hana No Namae Wo Bokutachi Wa Mada Shiranai

quotes.show: Ano Hi Mita Hana No Namae Wo Bokutachi Wa Mada Shiranai
quotes.quote: Nothing you or your friends say will affect my life in any way, shape, or form.

quotes.show: Ano Hi Mita Hana No Namae Wo Bokutachi Wa Mada Shiranai
Ano Hi Mita Hana No Namae Wo Bokutachi Wa Mada Shiranai
quotes.quote: I thought I could just apologize tomorrow. But that tomorrow... never came.

quotes.show: Ano Hi Mita Hana No Namae Wo Bokutachi Wa Mada Shiranai
quotes.quote: I'll never dream about things that I know won't come true.

quotes.show: Ano Hi Mita Hana No Namae Wo Bokutachi Wa Mada Shiranai
quotes.quote: I’m not the same as you. I’ll never dream about things that I know won’t come true.

quotes.show: Ano Hi Mita Hana No Namae Wo Bokutachi Wa Mada Shiranai
quotes.quote: People do change, little by little.

quotes.show: Ano Hi Mita Hana No Namae Wo Bokutachi Wa Mada Shiranai
quotes.quote: Everyone has changed. That's not it. The one who's changed the most, is me.
